mapper.select: SELECT must_read_id,commenter,must_read_title ,DATE_FORMAT(comment_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS comment_time ,COUNT(must_read_id) AS cts FROM wkrj_messagemanager Group by must_read_id ORDER BY comment_time DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{pagesize}

SELECT must_read_id,commenter,COUNT(commenter) AS cts, user_name,user_realname FROM wkrj_messagemanager,wkrj_sys_user where user_name=commenter Group by commenter ORDER BY cts DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{pagesize}

SELECT must_read_id,commenter,counties,user_name, count(counties) as cts from wkrj_messagemanager ,wkrj_sys_user where commenter=user_name and counties is NOT NULL group by counties ORDER BY cts DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{pagesize}
